common.code.css: .code-block { background: #f5f5f5; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 4px; font-family: monospace; white-space: pre-wrap; } .code-block pre { margin: 0; }

common.eventHandlers.code: function setupInputHandler(id, callback) { const el = document.getElementById(id); if (el) { el.addEventListener('input', callback); } }
